title: Digital Twin Energy Efficiency in Smart Buildings
content: Module for modeling consumption, efficiency improvements, and energy forecasting.

title: Digital Twin Predictive Maintenance in Manufacturing Plants
content: Module for synchronization with SCADA/MES systems and real-time scenario simulations for Predictive Maintenance and quality assurance in production.

title: Digital Twin for Cybersecurity Operational Processes
content: Module for making cybersecurity technologies interoperable to enhance the efficiency of Security Operations Centers (SOC).
